Labels.AccountActionRequired: Uh-oh! Your account is either past due or needs to be upgraded. {{primaryContactName}} needs to login to get this straightened out, then you'll be able to get back in.
Labels.ChatOfflineMessage: Vi er desværre ikke online i øjeblikket.
Labels.ChooseAccountText: Please select the account you wish to login to:
Labels.DiscordDisconnectConfirmation: Disconnecting from Discord will kick you out of any connected servers.
Labels.DiscordSummary: Join our Discord server and set your role.
Labels.DiscountsDontApplyToAddOnsOrAddOnSetupFe: Discounts don't apply to add-ons or add-on setup fees.
Labels.DoubleOptInMessage: We just sent you a message with a confirmation link that's required to confirm your subscription to this list.
Labels.FileUploadRequirements: Max {{maxSize}} per file. Accepted file types: {{accept}}
Labels.ForgotPasswordText: Can't get in? Enter your email below and we'll send you an email to get this sorted out.
Labels.IfYouHaveAMomentPleaseLetUsKnowWhyYouUns: If you have a moment, please let us know why you unsubscribed:
Labels.MaximumPeople: You can have a maximum of {{maximumPeople}} people on your plan.
Labels.NoSubscriptionFound: No subscription found for this account.
Labels.OptOutFromAllEmailLists: Opt out from all email lists
Labels.PasswordHistory: Not one of your last {{historySize}} passwords
Labels.PaymentAuthorization: I authorize {{companyName}} to send instructions to the financial institution that issued my card to take payments from my card account in accordance with the terms of my agreement with you.
Labels.PlanCancelReasonText: Please tell us more about why you are leaving (optional):
Labels.PlanCancellingText: Your plan is scheduled to end on {{cancellationDate}}.
Labels.PlanChangingText: Your plan is scheduled to change to {{planName}} at the end of the current billing cycle on {{changeDate}}.
Labels.PromoteTeamMemberText:
Are you sure you want to make {{personName}} the primary contact for your account?

If you proceed, you will be logged out and have to log back in again.
Labels.RegistrationComplete:
You have been registered.
Please contact {{supportEmail}} with any questions.
Labels.RegistrationCompleteConfirmEmail: We have sent an email to {{personEmail}}. Please click the link inside to complete the registration process.
Labels.RegistrationCompleteLogin: Your account has been created. Click the button below to login.
Labels.RemovePaymentInformationText: Are you sure you want to remove this card?
Labels.RemoveTeamMemberText: Are you sure you want to remove {{personName}} from your team?

Labels.WeWillNoLongerSendYouTheseEmails: We will no longer send you these emails.

Labels.YouHaveUnsubscribedFromList: You have unsubscribed from the {{listName}} list.
Labels.YourEmailSubscriptionPreferencesHaveBeen: Your email subscription preferences have been updated.
Labels.YourPaymentInformationHasBeenUpdated: Your payment information has been updated
Labels.YoureCurrentlyUsing: You are currently using {{current}} out of {{limit}} {{unitOfMeasure}} on your account.

Errors.DiscountInactive: This discount code is no longer active.
Errors.DiscountNotEligible: This discount code is no longer eligible for redemption.
Errors.DiscountNotEligibleForPlan: This discount code can not be applied to this plan.
Errors.Duplicate: An account for this email address already exists.
Errors.ExceedMaximumPeople: The number of users on the account must be less than the maximum allowed by the subscription plan.
Errors.FileInvalidType: Only {{accept}} file types can be uploaded.
Errors.InvalidToken: Your reset request has expired, please re-enter your email address again.
Errors.InvalidUserQuantity: The number of users selected cannot be less than the number of current team members.
Errors.PasswordsDoNotMatch: The new password and confirm password fields do not match.
Errors.PaymentInformationRequired: Please enter payment information for your account.
Errors.RegistrationRateExceeded: The servers are too busy at the moment. Please try again later.
Errors.SubscriptionExpired: Your subscription has expired, please choose a new plan.
Errors.SubscriptionQuantityUpgradeRequired: You must increase your plan quantity to at least {{newRequiredQuantity}}.
Errors.SystemError: A system error has occurred. Please try again later.
Errors.UnknownError: A system error has occurred. Please try again later.
